text: (viniscaya sandaha) ovun siyallanvama api ekarasi karana dinadi ovungen samanayan taba namadinnanta “obat, oba samanayan taba næmadu devivarunda, podiyak mehi pramada vanu” yayi pavasa, ovun atare tibunu sambandhaya paha karamu. e avasthavdi ovunge devivarun (ovunta) “oba apava næmaduvema næta” yayida
